subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. selection process may seem suspiciously rigged in favor of the big-conferences, but the tournament winner will be decided on the court, not in the court of public opinion.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. selection process may seem suspiciously rigged in favor of the big-conferences, but the tournament winner will be decided on the court, not in the court of public opinion.
